name: Community Service - GDEX Game Jam 2020
description:
A retro-inspired skating collect-a-thon where the goal is to tear up the streets, while cleaning them up too!

Made in ~2 weeks for GDEX Game Jam 2020 (the jam build is available as a .zip for archive purposes). The current version has slightly cleaned up controls, eliminates the timer bug, and includes a feature or two not found in the jam build. Still pretty bare bones though.

GAMEPAD RECOMMENDED! 

Controls-

Click the game screen to focus, then press any key to start game (even if playing with Gamepad, must press a keyboard key to start)

Move: Left stick or WASD/Arrow Keys

Jump: A button or Spacebar

Grind: (while jumping on rail) X button or Shift

MUSIC CREDITS: LtBolo (with permission)
